name: Laura's "Thin Mint" Brownies
author: abbyqs
summary: This is an easy, delicious desert that tastes just like the famous Girl Scout cookies!
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package brownie mix (such as Betty Crocker®)
20  chocolate mint layer candies (such as Andes®), or more as needed, unwrapped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir brownie mix, oil, water, and eggs together in a bowl until well-blended
Spread mixture in prepared baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted 2 inches from the side of the dish comes out almost clean, about 25 minutes
Transfer baking dish from oven to wire cooking rack and while still hot, arrange mint candies across the top about 1/4- to 1/2-inch apart
Let sit until candies melt, about 3 minutes
Spread melted mints evenly over brownies with a spatula
Cool until top layer hardens, 4 to 5 hours
